column1: Smoque BBQ////Easily the best BBQ in Chicago.  Pulled pork
column3: Ribs:  all kill the competition.  Peach Cobbler
column5: Slaw...are all worth the trip alone.  I'm writing this after having been to EVERY other BBQ joint in the city (never had the ribs at Twin Anchors
column6: but I've had the pulled pork).
